title: Bug in parsing of featureXML files

content.raw:
According to schema feature element can have several UserParam child elements. The current implementation of parser returns only the last UserParam, probably since it overwrites them iteratively during parsing. The proper way would be to accumulate all UserParams in the list or in a dictionary with *name* attribute of UserParam element used as a key.
I have attached a simple example.
content.html: According to schema feature element can have several UserParam child elements. The current implementation of parser returns only the last UserParam, probably since it overwrites them iteratively during parsing. The proper way would be to accumulate all UserParams in the list or in a dictionary with name attribute of UserParam element used as a key. I have attached a simple example.
